org.apache.giraph.comm.messages

接口 BasicMessageStore<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex id
    M - Message data
    所有超级接口:
    org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable
    所有已知子接口:
    FlushableMessageStore<I,M>, MessageStore<I,M>, MessageStoreByPartition<I,M>
    所有已知实现类:
    ByteArrayMessagesPerVertexStore, DiskBackedMessageStore, DiskBackedMessageStoreByPartition, OneMessagePerVertexStore, SequentialFileMessageStore, SimpleMessageStore

    public interface BasicMessageStore<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable
    Most basic message store with just add, get and clear operations

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void addMessages(MessageStore<I,M> messageStore)
      Adds messages from one message store to another
      void clearAll()
      Clears all resources used by this store.
      void clearVertexMessages(I vertexId)
      Clears messages for a vertex.
      Iterable<M> getVertexMessages(I vertexId)
      Gets messages for a vertex.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable

        readFields, write

    • 方法详细资料

      • addMessages

        void addMessages(MessageStore<I,M> messageStore)
                 throws IOException
        Adds messages from one message store to another
        参数:
        messageStore - Add the messages from this message store to this object
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getVertexMessages

        Iterable<M> getVertexMessages(I vertexId)
                                                                    throws IOException
        Gets messages for a vertex. The lifetime of every message is only guaranteed until the iterator's next() method is called. Do not re-use the messages.
        参数:
        vertexId - Vertex id for which we want to get messages
        返回:
        Iterable of messages for a vertex id
        抛出:
        IOException

      • clearVertexMessages

        void clearVertexMessages(I vertexId)
                         throws IOException
        Clears messages for a vertex.
        参数:
        vertexId - Vertex id for which we want to clear messages
        抛出:
        IOException

      • clearAll

        void clearAll()
              throws IOException
        Clears all resources used by this store.
        抛出:
        IOException
